thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Amber Halvorson, Partner, A Plus Accounting LLC, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle

author: cbs8
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Amber Halvorson, Partner, A Plus Accounting LLC, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Amber Halvorson selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) August 25, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Amber Halvorson as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in accounting. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters.
“I’m pleased to recognize Amber with this important honor,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her perseverance, work ethic and leadership qualities are an inspiration to all women.”
Amber Halvorson, a partner at A Plus Accounting LLC , is exceptionally passionate about her career. An avid reader, she obtained a B.A. in Business from Columbia University. She has since enjoyed a successful career as a skilled and diligent bookkeeper. Managing legal files and large volumes of books, Ms. Halvorson’s eye for detail and strong organization skills have made her an integral part of A Plus Accounting.
In addition to Ms. Halvorson’s accomplishments in her field, her dedication to charity is admirable. She is currently involved with the American Cancer Society as well as St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital.
Awards & Accomplishments: Member of the American Bookkeeping Association; B.A., Columbia University, Business
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
